title: Sinking Sands
lyrics:
I was thinking about the sinking sands
And I was thinking about the ancient lands
I was thinking about the radio
It's not a problem that I used to know
I was talking with my friend Max
His mind is made up, isn't turning back

About the things that he often reads

It's just the problem he really believes

He says



Well, I got this feeling

It's a feeling I don't know

And when you start believing

It's a fear of the unknown

Well, I got this feeling

It's a fear of the unknown



He was talking about the sinking sands

He was talking about the ancient lands

He was talking about the radio

It's not a problem that he used to know

He was thinking in Comic Sans

And he was lost in unknown lands

Fun at first but now it's gone astray

It's just a problem and it gets in the way

He says



Well, I got this feeling

It's a feeling I don't know

And when you start believing

It's a fear of the unknown

Well, I got this feeling

It's a feeling I don't know

And when you start believing
